name: Black Hole Wars
description:
Two players use gravity guns to grab and shoot asteroids into the opponents sun to cause it to go super nova and turn into a black hole. If you get sucked in to the black hole, you lose ... obviously. The arena is set in the path of an asteroid belt; the asteroids pass in the middle of the arena allowing both players to grab and shoot as much and as fast as they can.

Controls

Left analog stick: move forward, back, and side to side

Right analog stick: look up and down and turn

A: Jump

R1 bumper: Grab the asteroid/Drop the asteroid

L1 bumper: shoot the asteroid

Features the voice talents of Michael "Skitch" Schiciano) as the snarky announcer who reminds us that the singularity is a sad song, indeed.
